pr_title: Adopt a shared AdminClient across selected CC components

timeline.message: Adopt a shared AdminClient across selected CC components

timeline.bodyText: Is the AdminClient thread-safe?  I couldn't find a yes or no answer in the javadocs for KafkaAdminClient class or Admin interface searching for "thread" or "safe".
timeline.author: smccauliff

replies.bodyText: The linked issue, i.e. #1340, seems to be the only source verifying the thread safety of AdminClients -- i.e. confirmed by @cmccabe at https://stackoverflow.com/a/61738065.
replies.author: efeg

replies.bodyText: Update: I created KAFKA-10583 along with the corresponding PR involving the JavaDoc update.
